item.description:
Come to the October PHP Meetup and PICK A NEW ORGANIZER!

Since I'm moving to Ohio, I'll need to pass the torch to one of the group members. Mike? Andrew? Phil? Come to the Oct. Meetup and see them DUEL TO THE DEATH!

NEW LOCATION: Thanks to Phil from Shazamm, the Providence PHP Meetup has a new home at the swank Shazamm studios on Branch Ave. in Providence.

The meetup is growing by leaps and bounds, so come out to Branch Ave on Oct. 3rd and keep the momentum up.

HOW TO GET THERE:

Shazamm Studios
715 Branch Ave.

Their office is the building in front of the big mill building next to Providence bicycle.

The bike shop should be closed during the meetup so people can park in that lot.

You have to walk down an alley between the mill building and Shazamm to get to the door.
item.name: Providence PHP Meetup November Meetup
